snippet: At the 92nd Street Y, an exercise class called Relentless has several components and tends to have repeat participants.
abstract: Urban Athlete column on Relentless, a 75-minute weekly exercise class held at the 92nd Street Y, which delivers a barrage of cardio and strength moves meant to test and train the whole body.
lead_paragraph: At the 92nd Street Y, an exercise class called Relentless has several components and tends to have repeat participants.

headline.seo: Relentless, an Exercise Class Built on Relentlessness
headline.main: Step and Lunge and Forge Bonds
headline.print_headline: Step and Lunge and Forge Bonds
